subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Boston’s Tim Wakefield struck out Vernon Wells in the fourth inning for his 2,000th career strikeout, but the Blue Jays salvaged the final game of a three-games series.
snippet: Boston’s Tim Wakefield struck out Vernon Wells in the fourth inning for his 2,000th career strikeout, but the Blue Jays salvaged the final game of a three-games series.
